trans-unit.source: The key to a particular remoting message property.
trans-unit.target: 특정 원격 메시지 속성에 대한 키입니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of a particular remoting message property.

Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector" /> class should ignore a particular <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage" /> property while creating an <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef" /> for a <see cref="T:System.MarshalByRefObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector" /> 클래스에 대해 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage" />를 만드는 동안 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef" /> 클래스가 특정 <see cref="T:System.MarshalByRefObject" /> 속성을 무시할지 여부를 결정합니다.

trans-unit.source: True if the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector" /> class should ignore a particular <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage" /> property while creating an <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef" /> for a <see cref="T:System.MarshalByRefObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector" /> 클래스에 대해 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage" />를 만드는 동안 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef" /> 클래스가 특정 <see cref="T:System.MarshalByRefObject" /> 속성을 무시해야 하는 경우 true입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MessageSurrogateFilter> delegate is intended for use only by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework; you should not instantiate the delegate directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MessageSurrogateFilter> 대리자 사용 하기 위한.NET Framework의 원격 인프라에 의해서만 하며 대리자를 직접 인스턴스화할 하지 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector.Filter%2A> property of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector> class gets and sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MessageSurrogateFilter> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector.Filter%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector> 클래스를 가져오고 설정는 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MessageSurrogateFilter> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: Each key/value parameter pair is a remoting message property that belongs to the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage.Properties%2A> property of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> class.
trans-unit.target: 각 키/값 매개 변수 쌍에 속하는 원격 메시지 속성은는 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage.Properties%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> 클래스입니다.
